subtitle: This easy-to-make mango chutney is great with curried dishes.

method.text: Peel and slice the fresh mangos, or slice the canned mangos. Place in a bowl with the apples. Sprinkle with salt. Leave to stand for 2-1 days.
Rinse and drain the fruit and place in a large bowl with the onion. Cover and cook in the microwave for 6 min on 100% (FULL) power, stirring once, halfway through.
Add the vinegar, spices and sugar. Mix well and cook, uncovered, for 20 min, stirring every 5 min until the chutney is thick.
Pour into warmed jars, seal and label.

title: Mango chutney - microwave
